title: Cutpurse Twisted Fate for Colorblind people
body: I am colorblind.  When I am against cutpurse twisted fate it is extremely difficult for me to tell gold card from red card.  I have to squint and specifically concentrate above tf's head for a good second or two.  This can be quite frustrating when playing against this skin even though it isn't that common.  It would be awesome if you guys could touch this up like you did Tahm's grey health.  Thanks!
